donation.description: If you like Reply with Attachments and want to support its development, you can donate here:

glossary.title: i18n Glossary
glossary.description: Canonical terms used in the add‑on UI and documentation. Use these to keep translations consistent across locales.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Massive language support, thanks to AI translation tools — covering 103 languages.

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: The add‑on requests a small, focused set of permissions only. Why each is needed:

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Reply with Attachments does not collect analytics or telemetry and does not send your data anywhere.

quickstart.title: Quickstart
quickstart.description: 1. Install the add‑on from Thunderbird Add‑ons.

support.title: Support
support.description: Need help or want to report a bug?

third-party-licenses.title: د درېیم اړخ جوازونه
third-party-licenses.description: دا مخ د دې زېرمتون له خوا کارېدونکي د درېيمې ډلې جوازونو لنډيز وړاندې کوي. د سرچينې په ونه کې د باوري لېست لپاره، د زېرمتون په ريښه کې THIRDPARTYLICENSES.md وګورئ.
